item.title: Music streaming app powered by AI (Part 1)
item.description: In this series I’ll go through on how I did an app that streams songs generated by artificial intelligence. What will be covered ? Discussion on the system design for this simple application. Brief discussion on how music is generated by AI Implementation details with code samples. Artificial intelligence is capable of composing compelling music ? The short answer is: it depends. First of all, music taste is something unique to each person.

item.title: About me
item.description: I am a Software Engineer graduated at State University of Campinas with Bachelor’s of Science in Computer Engineering. My interests are Web and Mobile development for large scale applications. I am also interested in Machine Learning for solving real world problems.
